events.name: Drone attack on Russian oil refinery
events.wd_label: Drone attack on Russian oil refinery
events.wd_description: Dramatic footage emerged of a drone crashing into the Novoshakhtinsk oil refinery in Rostov, causing a fiery explosion in what appears to be an attack inside Russia's borders.
events.description: Dramatic footage emerged of a drone crashing into the Novoshakhtinsk oil refinery in Rostov, causing a fiery explosion in what appears to be an attack inside Russia's borders.

events.name: Details of the attack
events.wd_description: The drone crashed into the oil refinery, potentially breaching Russia's air defense. Ukraine has not claimed responsibility for the attack.
events.description: The drone crashed into the oil refinery, potentially breaching Russia's air defense. Ukraine has not claimed responsibility for the attack.

events.name: Implications of the attack
events.wd_description: If confirmed, the drone was either launched from within Russia or passed through Russian-controlled territory, evading Russian air defense systems.
events.description: If confirmed, the drone was either launched from within Russia or passed through Russian-controlled territory, evading Russian air defense systems.

events.name: Impact on refinery operations
events.wd_description: No one was hurt in the incident, but the refinery has ceased operations pending repairs.
events.description: No one was hurt in the incident, but the refinery has ceased operations pending repairs.

events.name: Malaysia's chicken export ban to Singapore, June 2022
events.wd_label: Malaysia's chicken export ban to Singapore, June 2022
events.wd_description: Malaysia imposed an embargo on the export of live chickens to Singapore to address local shortages, leading to concerns in Singapore about the impact on poultry supply and prices, as chicken is a staple of the national diet.
events.description: Malaysia imposed an embargo on the export of live chickens to Singapore to address local shortages, leading to concerns in Singapore about the impact on poultry supply and prices, as chicken is a staple of the national diet.

events.name: Malaysian export ban
events.wd_description: The Malaysian Prime Minister announced a ban on the export of live chickens to combat local shortages and control rising prices.
events.description: The Malaysian Prime Minister announced a ban on the export of live chickens to combat local shortages and control rising prices.

events.name: Impact on Singapore's poultry supply
events.wd_description: The ban significantly affects Singapore, which relies on Malaysia for a third of its poultry imports, with concerns about price surges and the adequacy of frozen chicken as a substitute.
events.description: The ban significantly affects Singapore, which relies on Malaysia for a third of its poultry imports, with concerns about price surges and the adequacy of frozen chicken as a substitute.

events.name: Global food shortage context
events.wd_description: The chicken shortage in Singapore adds to the global food shortages experienced in recent months, exacerbating supply chain challenges and rising prices.
events.description: The chicken shortage in Singapore adds to the global food shortages experienced in recent months, exacerbating supply chain challenges and rising prices.

events.name: North Korean ballistic missile launch
events.wd_description: North Korea launched a ballistic missile from the Sunan airport, aiming to achieve nuclear arsenal dominance as fast as possible.
events.description: North Korea launched a ballistic missile from the Sunan airport, aiming to achieve nuclear arsenal dominance as fast as possible.

events.name: Missile launch
events.wd_description: The missile was traced to the ocean of North Korea’s east coast, confirmed by the Japanese Ministry of Defence.
events.description: The missile was traced to the ocean of North Korea’s east coast, confirmed by the Japanese Ministry of Defence.

events.name: Regional response
events.wd_description: South Korea and Japan attested to the launch, with South Korea's President Yoon Suk-yeol promising a strong military alliance with the United States.
events.description: South Korea and Japan attested to the launch, with South Korea's President Yoon Suk-yeol promising a strong military alliance with the United States.

events.name: CATL Germany Factory Milestone
events.wd_description: CATL's first overseas factory in Thuringia, Germany, has obtained a license for cell production, marking a significant step in its global expansion.
events.description: CATL's first overseas factory in Thuringia, Germany, has obtained a license for cell production, marking a significant step in its global expansion.

events.name: License Issuance Ceremony
events.wd_description: During a celebration ceremony in the "Erfurt Crossroads" industrial area, Thuringia's ministers issued the second phase license for CATL's German factory, granting an 8GWh cell production capacity.
events.description: During a celebration ceremony in the "Erfurt Crossroads" industrial area, Thuringia's ministers issued the second phase license for CATL's German factory, granting an 8GWh cell production capacity.

events.name: Factory Overview
events.wd_description: CATL's German factory, which includes both purchased and newly built facilities, is in the equipment installation phase and aims to start production by the end of 2022.
events.description: CATL's German factory, which includes both purchased and newly built facilities, is in the equipment installation phase and aims to start production by the end of 2022.

events.name: t: G1 Facility
events.wd_description: The G1 facility involves assembling battery cells into modules in a purchased building.
events.description: The G1 facility involves assembling battery cells into modules in a purchased building.

events.name: t: G2 Facility
events.wd_description: The G2 facility, which received the cell production license, is a newly constructed building for cell production.
events.description: The G2 facility, which received the cell production license, is a newly constructed building for cell production.

events.name: Economic and Environmental Impact
events.wd_description: The factory represents one of the most significant industrial investments in Thuringia in decades, expected to create 1,500 jobs initially and a total of 2,000 jobs in the future, with part of its energy supplied by solar panels.
events.description: The factory represents one of the most significant industrial investments in Thuringia in decades, expected to create 1,500 jobs initially and a total of 2,000 jobs in the future, with part of its energy supplied by solar panels.

events.name: t: Job Creation
events.wd_description: The factory is expected to provide 1,500 jobs by the end of 2022 and a total of 2,000 jobs once fully operational.
events.description: The factory is expected to provide 1,500 jobs by the end of 2022 and a total of 2,000 jobs once fully operational.

events.name: t: Sustainable Energy Use
events.wd_description: To achieve sustainable battery production, part of the factory's energy will come from solar panels installed on the building's roof.
events.description: To achieve sustainable battery production, part of the factory's energy will come from solar panels installed on the building's roof.
